# mlr3torch

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of {mlr3torch} is to connect [{mlr3}](https://github.com/mlr-org/mlr3) with [{torch}](https://github.com/mlverse/torch).

<!-- install.packages("mlr3torch") -->
<!-- ``` -->

```r
remotes::install_github("jemus42/mlr3torch")
```
